args:
To appease the soldiers while also protecting
the beach, Patia challenges them to a contest.
And while the soldiers leave satisfied, their
mission remains a mysteryâ€”one that Patia and
Mikoto worry may represent a greater threat.
Get 'em, boys! We WILL have our vacation!
I see you vacation-thirsty beasts have\nreturned! But wait just a moment!
Ha! We don't have to listen to you!\nWe're enemies, remember?

You'd be wise to listen all the same.
Do it precisely BECAUSE we are foes;
because you thirst deep for recreation!
If you want the beach, LIVE the beach!
Battles at the beach are fought not with\nweapons, but with sport! That is the true\nspirit of the shoreline!
Lathom Beach exists for recreation,\nand any who would turn up their noses\nat beach sports are wholly unfit to hold it.
Throw away your weapons and throw down\nwith us instead! Show us your might as\nyou cavort across the sand!
If that's a challenge, we accept!
I'd not expected so immediate an assent.
Then let's begin with a little\nbeach volleyball!
Death match style, anything goes.\nFirst team to three points wins.\nAre these terms acceptable?
Then I'll take first serve.\nLet's raise a ruckus, right arm!
...Point and match! It seems the\nimperial team has won the day.
But how?! How could I have possibly\nlost at my own game?!
Don't beat yourself up, ladyâ€”we had a\nwhole team playing against just you.\nAin't no way you're beating those odds.
A fair point. But worry not, my friend;\nthe next event is groovy-groove surfing,\nand I do not intend to lose.
Sorry. Did you just say\nï¼‚groovy-groove surfing?ï¼‚

It is a means of competition I discovered
while searching the world for Mineuchi.
One wins by finding so groovy a groove
that they control the waves themselves.
So it's just a surfing competition, then.\nYou shoulda said soâ€”we're all a bunch\nof zimzala board freaks, so this'll be easy!
I have zero idea what is happening here,\nso I'll just leave it to you. Good luck!
Bwah! There's a giant tidal wave\ncoming at us from outta nowhere!
My battle began the moment I took\nsurfboard in hand. I fear nothing,\nfor I am one with the sea.

Wooo, I'm grooving in my groove now!
We just gotta maintain the momentum
from when we beat that lady and we'll
totally rule this beach!
Blurgh! Okay, now this wave\nis just toying with me!
Finding a groovier groove than one who\nhas attained revelation is no easy task.
Fine, you win. That means we're tied.\nBut that only makes my fire burn brighter,\nso we'll lock up the win with beach flags!
And THEN a no-holds-barred\nsand castle buildstravaganza!
Keep shouting those requests, guys!\nOh, and don't worryâ€”we'll make sure\nto kick your butts in every last one!
We've been at this all day.\nEven I'm feeling a bit winded.
Yeah, but I'm tired in a GOOD way.\nI'll never forget this day, that's for sure.
It was a damn good time.
Yeah, it's almost like I got rid of this\nhuge weight that was holding me down.
We won some and we lost some,\nbut I don't even care about that anymore.

Yeah, I feel like this whole thing has really
opened my eyes. That whole ï¼‚storm the
beachï¼‚ thing seems like a pretty stupid
idea in retrospect.
Thanks for this, lady. We owe you.
Well, I guess it's back to work for us.\nWe'll restart the search fresh tomorrow!
Well, looks like we saved the beach.\nAnd by making a competition out of it,\nthere were no hard feelings in the end.
I couldn't have done it without you,\nMikoto. Thank you.
I merely did as Heaven bade me. But...

That soldier mentioned resuming a search.
Perhaps they seek cats as part of an
ecological survey of this island?
If so, I would hope to join them.
The Empire has no truck with cats, Mikoto.\nIf they're looking for something, it is\nbecause they seek a military benefit.
Hmm. So they're searching this area,\nand appear to be under strict orders to\nkeep looking until it is found...
They were careful not to reveal the details,\nbut that does indeed seem to be the case.
Does this not seem odd to you?\nLathom is a tourist destination;\nwhat could they be looking for?

There are no relics with potential military
uses, and barely any resources they could
mine to make weapons. All it has to offer
is white sand and good vibes.
And the cats all strut about freely.\nThis is a good place, and I do not see\nyour problem with it.
I don't HAVE a problem with it, Mikoto!\nI merely think it's odd that the Empire\nwould be searching a place like this.
What could they possibly be looking for?
I know not. However, if you fear the\ntranquility of this place may be broken\nonce again...
Then there may yet be more that I must\ndo to restore the balance of nature here.
